description: Try our easy to follow Herb & Spice Rub recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Herb & Spice Rub Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Toast fennel or coriander seeds and peppercorns in a small frying pan over medium heat, shaking pan frequently, for about 3 minutes or until aromatic. Remove from heat and cool.
Transfer to a spice grinder and add thyme, oregano, rosemary and chilli flakes. Process until finely chopped. Transfer to a bowl with the salt and sugar and combine well. Store in a jar.
